title: Premium Location, Excellent Staff
text:
If it was up to my daughter (12 yo) - she would not have left Hotel Brighton.
Location : right across Tuileries Garden, The Louvre, and about 20 - 25 minute walk to Notre Dame. There are a number of restaurants nearby. There's a Metro just across the hotel.
Amenities : there's a restaurant in the first floor, breakfast, laundry, bathrobes, slippers, mini bar, wifi - fast.
Room : adequate for 2 adults and 1 child, it's clean, there's a big tub in the bathroom. The handle in the bathroom got stuck. When my husband pulled hard - it got loosened. When we reported this to Mohamed (front desk) - he immediately offered a different room. We appreciated this a lot ... but we declined since we we're so tired at the end of everyday we were in Paris. The room was clean, the bed very comfortable and the temperature - just right.
Staff : Superlative words to Mohamed and Andre!!! Mohamed works the front desk, while Andre showed us the rooms and helped us with our heavy carry ons/luggage. We could not say enough great things how these 2 helped us. Mohamed/Andre were very helpful with all our needs including giving us anything we needed like extra drinks especially after our tiring but wonderful sightseeing in Paris. These 2 were the reason my daughter fell in love with Hotel Brighton.
